vulnerabilities.recommendation: Add validation: require!() checks, is_empty(), bounds checking. Validate addresses with addr_validate(). Check amounts > 0.

vulnerabilities.description: IBC message handler lacks nonce/sequence validation. Attacker could replay messages across chains or timeout periods.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement packet sequence validation and nonce tracking. Store processed packet hashes. Check timeout_timestamp.
